work.summary: To build mobile games or applications for Android and IOS using Unity3D.

projects.name: PuzzleCore (Powercore)
projects.description: It's a match 3 puzzle adventure game that spans the many worlds of the Oniverse.

projects.name: Photobomb AR (Powercore)
projects.description: It's an application made in Unity that allows you to detect an image and will show an Augmented Reality object.

work.summary: To build mobile applications for Android that allows you to stream and watch it live on your phone.

projects.name: APEC TV
projects.description: A mobile application that allows you to watch live video stream of what was happening during the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation Summit.
